summary: Artikel & Kontrakte Module Testing - All 24 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified: Both modules have new sidebar-detail layout matching Adressen page. CRUD operations, sidebar navigation, edit mode, and create dialogs all working correctly.

issues: Date picker uses browser's default date input (mm/dd/yyyy format) instead of shadcn calendar component - minor UX inconsistency

critical_code_review_comments: Artikel sidebar has 6 sections: Stammdaten, Einheiten, Klassifizierung, AVV-Codes, Zoll & Export, Bemerkungen - all working
Kontrakte sidebar has 6 sections: Kopfdaten, Vertragspartner, Termine, Konditionen, Positionen, Bemerkungen - all working
Both modules use slide-in detail panel from right side (600px width) - consistent with Adressen page
Edit mode toggle (Bearbeiten/Speichern) works correctly in both modules
Create dialogs have proper form validation and success toast notifications
Soft-delete implemented for both Artikel and Kontrakte (sets aktiv=false or deleted=true)
Kontrakte type filter uses 'ALL' value for 'Alle Typen' option (Radix UI Select requirement)
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix for Artikel and Kontrakte during backend tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Artikel and Kontrakte modules fully functional with new sidebar-detail layout. Backend endpoints: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE for /api/artikel and /api/kontrakte. Frontend: Table view with double-click to detail panel, sidebar navigation between sections, edit mode, create dialogs. Both modules match the Adressen page design pattern.

backend_endpoints.GET /api/artikel: WORKING - List with pagination and search

frontend_ui.artikel_list: WORKING - Table with ANR, Bezeichnung, Einheit, Gruppe, Gefahrgut, Status columns
frontend_ui.edit_mode: WORKING - Toggle between view/edit with Bearbeiten/Speichern button
frontend_ui.create_dialog: WORKING - Form with ANR, Artikelbezeichnung, Mengeneinheit, Artikelgruppe, Aktiv/Gefahrgut toggles

backend_endpoints.GET /api/kontrakte: WORKING - List with pagination, search, and type filter

frontend_ui.kontrakte_list: WORKING - Table with Nr., Typ, Vertragspartner, Gültig bis, Status, Positionen columns
frontend_ui.type_filter: WORKING - Dropdown with Alle Typen/Einkauf/Verkauf options
frontend_ui.edit_mode: WORKING - Toggle between view/edit with Bearbeiten/Speichern button
frontend_ui.create_dialog: WORKING - Form with Kontrakttyp, Buchungsnummer, Vertragspartner, PLZ, Ort, Gültig von/bis
frontend_ui.status_badges: WORKING - Color-coded: OFFEN (blue), AKTIV (green), TEILERFUELLT (yellow), ERFUELLT (emerald), STORNO (red)

notes.kontrakte_type_display: Typ column shows 'Verkauf' for all entries because older contracts have 'ist_einkauf' field instead of 'vorgang_typ' - this is expected behavior as mentioned in misc_info
notes.date_picker: Create dialog uses browser's native date input instead of shadcn calendar - minor UX inconsistency but functional
